thread.title: James Corden's inappropriate movie musicals has Nathan Lane as The Terminator - Fun
thread.title_full: James Corden's inappropriate movie musicals has Nathan Lane as The Terminator - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: James Corden's inappropriate movie musicals has Nathan Lane as The Terminator - Fun
text: Leave it to James Corden to turn some of Hollywood's strangest movies into the Broadway musicals they were destined to become.James is always ready to sing on The Late Late Show - and, this time, he asked Broadway legend Nathan Lane to help him recreate one of The Terminator's classic scenes as a dance number.You'll never hear Arnie's signature catchphrase "I'll be back" the same way again.Comedian Rachel Bloom also got in on the action while setting poor young Regan's possession in The Exorcist to song, before Corden and Lane brought the show home with Seven.We definitely need another round the next time Nathan Lane's in LA. How about Die Hard, Halloween and The Godfather?The Late Late Show with James Corden continues - with lots more singing - weeknights on CBS.
